snippet: A Tunisian passenger train smashed into a semitrailer truck racing to cross the tracks early Tuesday, killing 18 people as two cars derailed.
abstract: Tunisian passenger train smashes into semi-trailer truck crossing tracks near Fahs; truck driver survives but two cars on train derail, killing 18 people and injuring at least 86.
lead_paragraph: A Tunisian passenger train smashed into a semitrailer truck racing to cross the tracks early Tuesday, killing 18 people as two cars derailed.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Tunisia: Train Strikes Truck, Killing 18
